div.p: I'm a graduate of the DeSales University ACCESS program.
I graduated in 2010, in the Business Dept.
I had been trying to go back to school for probably 20 years, but with my business schedule
and work schedule it was really impossible to get it done.
I managed to take a small break from a full-time career and decided that I absolutely wanted
to get my degree taken care of, so this worked out really well for us.
